description: Since we live in a democry, simply create a poll with me
usage: {emotes.use} | Use {prefix}poll <question> | response 1 | response 2 | response 3 | ... (up to 10 reponses)
usageHelp: poll <question> | response 1 | response 2 | response 3 | ... (up to 10 reponses)
minArgs: {emotes.error} | You must specify at least 2 responses
maxArgs: {emotes.error} | You may only specify up to 10 responses
